title: Mary Berry's Quick Cooking
overview: Mary Berry's Quick Cooking follows Mary as she explores some of the most exciting places that have mastered or inspired the very best of speedy cooking. This adventure takes her abroad to cities she's never visited before, along with places closer to home that we don't normally have access to. Entwined in these travels is Mary cooking some of her most delicious quick recipes that take no time at all - some in a kitchen and some perched on rooftops, in food trucks or tiny cafe kitchens.
